 2019-03252019-04-12,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  TC, 
ActCanada Shipping Act, 2001
SubjectRegulations Amending the Navigation Safety Regulations (Automatic Identification Systems)
PrecisRegulations Amending the NAVIGATION SAFETY REGULATIONS (AUTOMATIC IDENTIFICATION SYSTEMS) in order to (1) support the protection and recovery of Southern Resident Killer Whales and other endangered species, such as the North Atlantic Right Whale; and (2) further enhance navigation safety in terms of search and rescue efforts and collision avoidance.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0100 Publication Date: 2019-05-01
AttachmentsAttachment
